title.rendered: Many Bible verses call for peace

content.rendered:
While many right-wing religious people support war, actually many Bible verses call for peace.

I saw this recently and want to share it with you:

https://www.mennonitemission.net/resources/peace/peace-in-the-bible/24/Bible-verses-that-call-for-peace
